title: guard dog needed for base as towers have been replaced with laser pointers
body: My team are behind but with the late game gods on our side (vayne, jax) I attempted to motivate the crumbling troops "just defend the base guys we can win easy late game" Suddenly the enemy team appeared at the first inhibitor tower and we rushed towards it as 5 to hold back the attackers while staying under the safety of the laser tower. Just as the minion wave is cleared the enemy team attempts to dive. Ha i think to myself we will surely win this fight as we have the laser tower on our side. As the fight continues i notice that the beam directed towards the enemy tank does not seem to be doing any fucking damage. We were pushed back under the nexus towers having lost the middle inhibitor and 2 friendly champions and as the next minion wave approached we prepared for our final stand. Once again the wave was cleared with ziggs powerful bombs but it did not matter as the tank who still had over 3 quarters life remaining suddenly dived the 2 nexus towers. Surely this will prove their undoing but to my amazement the 2 little beams focused on the tank and still did no fucking damage and so we were aced losing nexus and the battle. Our late game team had not made it to the late game because there was no way to defend the towers against these tanks even with great waveclear as the towers were proved to be too fucking useless. This is the reason i think riot should add a huge fucking guard dog that can be deployed straight from the nexus to swallow up these annoying fucking tanks in a single bite.

This post made me laugh way too hard.

As much as I dislike tanks just tanking the inhib and nexus turrets like they're nothing, I can understand why riot is hesitant to buff them. If tanks could not tank those turrets every comp would involve having wave clear along with 2 late game hyper carries (at least). All you'd do is turtle and farm until you hit that magical powerspike.

The only way they could realistically buff those turrets would be to buff Baron (which is the anti-turtle buff), but that could cause even more troubles down the line. Best you can do is try to pick a heavy cc comp and pray your tanks know how to peel.

the answer already lies in items which exist as wall breakers: Banner of Command to buff Baron'ed minions and let the magic immune cannon minion siege for you, and Zzrot Portal to push a secondary lane.

If you refuse to use those items, then that is your problem for losing.

Of course these items are nerfed into uselessness because most players don't want to build different in order to win. You can already see the cries of Zed OP because people refuse to build seekers.
The laser is dumb if you ask me. I can't tell you how many champs escaped because the laser ran out of range. Maybe if it burned..... Like ignite....

I think it's ok that the later turrets take a while to ramp up (though they are too slow at it right now), but they should really do something like arc between minions for better siege defending, or shred armor/mr with each tic, because right now they deal pitiful damage and take longer to deal damage than the old single shot towers.
